Player History
Drafted in 29th round, 451st overall pick, by Houston in 2015...
Released by Houston on 4/21/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 5/1/2015 to a 1-year deal worth $500,000 per year...
Earned first career win on 7/8/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Colorado on 2/9/2016 to a 4-year deal worth $6,250,000 per year...
Was selected to the 2016 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 2017 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/21/2018, winning 2 games with a 2.45 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 2/16/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
